comment: Powerful. Vanilla, some smoke, and hints of fruit. Long finish. Great golden brown color.
Nose is lavender and rubbing alcohol, with a sweet, spicy, and viscous body. Finish is remarkably smooth given the proof, with a nice heat. Would definitely buy. (Advent calendar, day 5.)

Nose is very bourbon, caramel and vanilla and mamas apple pie!

Palate is woody and spice but still sweet stewed fruits. 

Finish is medium with wood and spice and light

Overall a great dram and at 55% plenty bang for yer buck!
Bite up front. Slight smokey flavor.
Oak and lemon on the nose. A dark cherry taste, some spice. Strong spicy alcohol finish. Good dram.

Nose: vanilla, grain alcohol, baked apple, lavender, short bread, very slight oak, pear, damp moss, Maduro cigar wrapper

Palate: great heat and mouth feel, oak, caramel, very light smoke, dark fruit, leather, baking spices

Finish: baking spices, light oak, great heat, long lasting leather
